summary: Tech encompasses a wide range of topics related to technology and its impact on society. It covers areas such as web development, global connectivity, innovation practices, and open sharing of knowledge. This theme explores how technology shapes our world, from the fragmentation of the internet to the concept of a global village. It also delves into practical aspects like strategic thinking, creative problem-solving, and effective communication in tech-driven environments.
excerpt: Tech explores technology's societal impact, covering web development, global connectivity, and innovation. It examines internet fragmentation, the global village concept, and practical aspects of strategic thinking and communication in tech-driven environments.
